system.requirement: If you wield an isihlangu shield...

abilities.description: When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.7e008d0f656dc8b3]{Clash} +iron and score a weak hit, you may choose to deal no harm. If you do, you have the initiative.

When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.c8bacc17f73d3103]{Face Danger} using your shield as cover, add +1 and take +1 momentum on a hit. On a miss, your shield is damaged and unusable until repaired or replaced.

When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.4dd8468e095810a4]{Secure an Advantage} by leveraging your shield to get your foe into a vulnerable position, add +1. On a hit, you have the initiative.
